note:
Artist/custom fab for Orlando theme parks for the past thirty years
Jesuit-educated atheist (my faith invested in science)
Dog lover
Proud Dem, Vote blue
My personal Pantheon of Heroes includes Twain, Sagan, Hitch, Bakshi, Hypatia, Feynman, Homer Simpson.
Native of Poughkeepsie, been Florida Man for most of my time breathing.
Perpetually wishing I was sitting on the dock at my cabin in the forest with milady and my pups.

My header is one of a series of mosaics I made for a Disney shop.
